connector.description: Detect and parse documents using Workday.

camel.sink.path.entity.name: camel.sink.path.entity
camel.sink.path.entity.description: The entity to be requested or subscribed via API. One of: [report] [commonAPI]

camel.sink.path.path.name: camel.sink.path.path
camel.sink.path.path.description: The API path to access an entity structure.

camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer.name: camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer
camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

camel.sink.endpoint.basicPropertyBinding.name: camel.sink.endpoint.basicPropertyBinding
camel.sink.endpoint.basicPropertyBinding.description: Whether the endpoint should use basic property binding (Camel 2.x) or the newer property binding with additional capabilities

camel.sink.endpoint.httpConnectionManage.name: camel.sink.endpoint.httpConnectionManager
camel.sink.endpoint.httpConnectionManage.description: Pool connection manager for advanced configuration.

camel.sink.endpoint.synchronous.name: camel.sink.endpoint.synchronous
camel.sink.endpoint.synchronous.description: Sets whether synchronous processing should be strictly used, or Camel is allowed to use asynchronous processing (if supported).

camel.sink.endpoint.reportFormat.name: camel.sink.endpoint.reportFormat
camel.sink.endpoint.reportFormat.description: Workday Report as a service output format. One of: [json]

camel.sink.endpoint.clientId.name: camel.sink.endpoint.clientId
camel.sink.endpoint.clientId.description: Workday client Id generated by API client for integrations.

camel.sink.endpoint.clientSecret.name: camel.sink.endpoint.clientSecret
camel.sink.endpoint.clientSecret.description: Workday client Secret generated by API client for integrations.

camel.sink.endpoint.tokenRefresh.name: camel.sink.endpoint.tokenRefresh
camel.sink.endpoint.tokenRefresh.description: Workday token Refresh generated for integrations system user.

camel.component.workday.lazyStartProduce.name: camel.component.workday.lazyStartProducer
camel.component.workday.lazyStartProduce.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

camel.component.workday.basicPropertyBin.name: camel.component.workday.basicPropertyBinding
camel.component.workday.basicPropertyBin.description: Whether the component should use basic property binding (Camel 2.x) or the newer property binding with additional capabilities
